website_summaries.verdict: In spite of some limitations, this handy wrench is like numerous tools in one, and a good pick for do-it-your-selfers and novices that don't need heavy-duty wrenches.
pros: A unique wrench that earns praise for solid build and extreme versatility – has 2 sides that fit screw heads 7 to 19 mm
cons: Awkward to use in small/tight spaces
Grip isn't as tight on some nuts and bolts as traditional wrenches, and tends to slip

customer_reviews.title: ... a little dubious when I see a new tool like this that has the appearance of being "gimmicky"
customer_reviews.text: I'm always a little dubious when I see a new tool like this that has the appearance of being "gimmicky". But curiosity got the better of me and I ordered this thing. It actually turned out to be a great tool. Very solid and well-made. I tried a variety of nuts and bolts and this wrench did not fail me. Its always good to be able to replace several devices with one. Makes your tool bag lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan An

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I install Elevators & its an awsome tool to have when on a 20ft. extension latter & can use this without walking up & down.Reason for 4 stars if it had a ratcheting part on it would give it 5 stars,,,but overall,,great tool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. A little awkward to use. Must thumb screw it tight and hold that as twisting.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This wrench is great. I carry tools with me when I ride my bike and it is a pain in the B#%&tt to need to carry multiple wrenches around. This wrench, even though it is bigger than expected, works perfectly. It is VERY heavy duty and you can tell when you hold it in your hands it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marx

customer_reviews.title: Saves space in my toolbox
customer_reviews.text: This wrench has been working well for me. I have the typical large collection of wrenches in my big home toolbox but like to keep the toolbox in my truck as minimal as possible, so that's where I keep this. I've only used it on fairly light duty tasks so far, but no complaints yet!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Schipano

customer_reviews.title: Not as useful as I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work that well on tight spots or rusted nuts.
customer_reviews.author: William Wu

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand
customer_reviews.text: It has a top and bottom that affect performance. Unfortunately, they got it backwards, so the working orientation has the handle angle down, which is very awkward. It doesn't work so well upside-down. Just go buy another brand if this is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: jsh

customer_reviews.title: This is a well made tool. I was so ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made tool. I was so impressed with this wrench when it was delivered, that I immediately ordered another one for my set of tools at my summer place. The original manufacturer is a Japanese company, but the quality is very high. This tool has exceeded my expectations. Thank you Jeremywell for bringing this tool to the United States. It puts Crecent and several other manufacturers to shame.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T. Blessington

customer_reviews.title: Great compact tool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tool to carry with me on my motorcycle to use for road side repairs. Having one wrench that offers so many various sizes has been a great asset. It is my number one go to tool.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kibbe

customer_reviews.title: Durable and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it so i would have some sort of wrench in my SUV. Finally a couple of days ago got to use it when i got stranded wit a Low battery and had nothing to un tighten da battery bolts. I remembered i had bought this a while back and left it on my glove box.. works great took off da battery and got it replaced and tightened da screw back really tight and da wrench never jumped a turn or broke.. Liking it alot....
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Garcia

customer_reviews.title: It was bigger and heavy duty than I thought it would be, a Plus.
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger and heavy duty than I thought it would be, a Plus. Worked well on a couple of bolts ,that I just wanted to see if it worked. It really could help you out if you were in a bind with no real tools on you. its probably not going to work on real hard to get at or hard rusted up nuts, unless using W-D, even than pray! so don't let your nuts get rusted.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Macgyver must have 👍
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept design of this tool so I ordered it I haven’t really had a need for using it but I’m sure that in a pinch not having all my tools with me I keep this in my back pack it’s with me all the time sturdy well made feels strong Can also lock in screwdriver tips So I give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cool Idea but flawed
customer_reviews.text: 9x out of 10 I use another tool that can actuallyaccess the nut. Having said that, sometimes its a good sub/replacement box wrenches. I say sometimes because the mid section is rounded which raises its hex head and can make it difficult or impossible to position and torque a nut.
customer_reviews.author: my2cents

customer_reviews.title: Just Adequate
customer_reviews.text: Adequate but feels cheap. The finish is uneven and comes with free scratches. Almost a quarter turn of play on the adjustment wheel. It could use some more deburring. The laser etching is not very legible. But it still works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Fishlegs

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to carry a couple of wrenches to make minor adjustments to my bicycle. With this I have a whole set of metric and standard at my disposal. I was very impressed how sturdy this is. A welcome addition to any toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: charles mcknight

customer_reviews.title: with a great idea solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Simple design; with a great idea solid construction; adjust thumb wheel to desired nut size and then tighten or remove it. It might also work on rounded ones, but I have not tried that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Graney

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and compact wrench.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust and effective for tightening or loosening bolts. Superior to an adjustable wrench ! Very sturdy although it does seem prone to rust and needs to be lubricated for smooth operation. A useful and compact addition to my toolset.
customer_reviews.author: marcus surrealleous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all purpose wrench!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wrench to keep in the car, it's like having a whole set of box end wrenches. the ends are thin enough to get almost anywhere the normal ones would fit. Easy adjustment and heavy weight. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tool! I keep it in my motorcycle tool kit and it not only cut down on the size of my kit, it drastically reduced the weight by doing the job of a multitude of other specialty tools. It is very robust and well made.
customer_reviews.author: MADMANF22

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good tool. It tends to slip and doesn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good tool. It tends to slip and doesn't have enough torque. I hardly use it. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Good In  Somewhere. Not all the time
customer_reviews.text: It working good on high spots but not on low spot because it ht as a big round head and a pin in the middle.

customer_reviews.title: SOLID
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 2 sons.....I hurt myself when I try and use any kind of tool

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, slim, well made. I dont have a full tool rack, just have a smaller toolbox This takes up barely any space and replaces however many wreches Excellent product, very happy i bought
customer_reviews.author: IIBuc_NastyII

customer_reviews.title: simple genius
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for larger size hex and i can even get it to grip down to 3/16" (though that small isn't advertised). it feels a lil too bulky for 1/4" but works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: Its a great concept but it only works on the bolts it was designed to be used on. You need good access to use it. It is quite precise and well built. Not a replacement for old school adjustable wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Shaft

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and useable
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best multi wrench i have ever owned. It is sturdy, easily adjusted, very capable regardless of size for most quick projects or simple repairs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Areas where nut is to be held are gouged and the rod that is to keep the nut tight varies in length and hole for rod varies as well making it hard to turn or too loose. Purchased one and received open item thinking that the marks were from someone miss using it and returned it. Ordered a second and was worst than the first. Over all very poor quality. Save your money and the hassle of returning items.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This tool turned out to be a lot handier than I thought it would. Great price too
customer_reviews.author: Robert Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Does not grab
customer_reviews.text: Does not grip any bolt no matter the size. Absolutely a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very handy when you need to remove a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very handy when you need to remove a nut/bolt in a pinch without looking for the ratchet socket. Tool is heavy duty and well made.
customer_reviews.author: joebas

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to keep clutter out of your tool bag if you are mobile!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool! I use it for work. I do not want to carry a ton of tools in my tool bag for when I go on quick calls around our facility. This thing comes in handy! I would recommend it for stuff like this.
customer_reviews.author: MaddogUSMC

customer_reviews.title: You really don’t even need a set of (smaller) wrenches when you have two of these
customer_reviews.text: Where’s this thing been all my life?! So convenient. Really takes the place of an entire set

customer_reviews.title: Saves Having a full Set of Wrenches
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have...works well.. Would be good bringing with on off road vehicle rides.

customer_reviews.title: An incredibly handy tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, useful tool. It seems to fit just about everything I try to use it on. As others have mentioned, the fact that it's "flat" can make it a bit awkward to use in some situations, but it's in no way a deal breaker, and the design is made to be portable, so it's understandable.

product_meta.title: Jeremywell 23 in 1 Adjustable Multi Functional Flexible Type Wrench 1/4''-3/4'', 7-19 mm
product_meta.description:
All Purpose Adjustable Wrench 23 in 1 Multi Functional Multiple Sizes 7-19 mm

-Brand New

-Free Shipping within the Continental United States

-Same business day order processing before 12:30PM PDT

-Satisfaction Guaranteed

Product Description: This 23 in 1 multi-functional wrench is adjustable to fit all sizes from 1/4'' to 3/4'' and 7mm to 19mm. It features an adjustment screw knob in the middle to access small and large nuts and bolts. The finish is clean bright high-polished rustproof chrome plating with numeric etchings to show the corresponding sizes with the correct side. The small closed end design makes it easy to access those hard to reach areas while giving you added space for turning. This multi wrench enables the user to apply more torque with the patented 3-point touch design. Most crescent wrenches only offer two points of strength, therefore causing the user to round off nut points needed to loosen nuts and bolts. So stop all the wrench slips and knuckle damage you get with regular crescent wrenches and get the new Smart wrench!
feature_bullets: Free Shipping within the Continental United States
Same business day order processing before 12:30PM PDT

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars283 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
